title: Dark Bot
about: Dark Bot is an intelligent web chatbot developed with Flask that answers questions based on a database of Q&A stored in JSON files. With a modern and responsive dark-themed interface, it offers a natural and fluid conversation experience.

The system uses text similarity algorithms to find the best answers to user queries, including a typing indicator that simulates a real conversation. It includes dynamic question suggestions that appear when interacting with the text input.

Developed with modern web technologies, Dark Bot offers an intuitive user experience with responsive design that adapts perfectly to mobile devices and tablets, eliminating the need for native applications.

Ideal for companies looking to implement a virtual assistant on their websites, providing instant answers to frequently asked questions and improving user experience without constant human intervention.
